subject: [Radiance-general] ies data.
body:
Hi Chris,

Did you have a look already at the book website:

http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/book/

?

I think you should download this tarball:

http://radsite.lbl.gov/radiance/book/ch3/scene2.tar.Z

Otherwise you can try fancier spotlights from different
lighting manufacturers:
iGuzzini, Erco, Zumtobel directly provide IES files ...

Cheers,

Francesco

________________________________

[mailto:radiance-general-bounces@radiance-online.org] On Behalf Of Chris
Foster
Sent: 18 July 2006 10:58
To: Radiance general discussion


Hello everybody,

Im after more help im afraid, but hopefully only a quick question.

Im following RwithR book and am attempting to do scene 2. On pages 161
and 163 of the book (I am trying to make some spotlights for the art
gallery) it mentions that the IES photometric files i need are on the
website. I cant find them! Can someone tell me where there are please.

I thought i had all the support files downloaded alreayd when i got
radiance but as i did a file search and i didnt come up with anything,
obviously not.

Thanks

Chris
